about.description:
GillesPy2 is an open-source Python package for stochastic simulation of biochemical systems.
It offers an object-oriented approach for creating mathematical models of biological systems,
as well as a variety of methods for performing time simulation of those models.
about.summary: GillesPy2 is an open-source Python package for stochastic simulation of biochemical systems.

name: gillespy2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "gillespy2" %}
{% set version = "1.3.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8e0eff83a8e29e0fe0c72252505fe216cd8cf95feb3d3714a9309d8c81e72656
  
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  
requirements:
  host:
    - python >3.5
    - pip
    - setuptools >=41.0.1
    
  run:
    - python >3.5
    - matplotlib >=3.0.3
    - plotly >=4.1.0
    - scipy >=1.3.1
    
test:
  imports:
    - gillespy2
     
about:
  home: https://github.com/GillesPy2/GillesPy2
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'GillesPy2 is an open-source Python package for stochastic simulation of biochemical systems.'

  description: |
    GillesPy2 is an open-source Python package for stochastic simulation of biochemical systems. 
    It offers an object-oriented approach for creating mathematical models of biological systems, 
    as well as a variety of methods for performing time simulation of those models.
    
  doc_url: https://gillespy2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/GillesPy2/GillesPy2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - briandrawert
    - Fin109
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.6.16
